name: Right Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet
tooltip:
Right Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet
Item Level 1
Quest Item
Unique
Use: Recombines the left, right and top pieces of Lord Valthalak's Amulet into one whole.
"This section of the amulet vibrates with a palpable fervor to be rejoined with its sibling pieces."
